about_the_game:
Bring some holiday spirit to the Starfall Islands with the Holiday Cheer Suit!

The Holiday Cheer Suit can be equipped by accessing the Title Menu and then selecting the EXTRA CONTENT submenu.
detailed_description:
Bring some holiday spirit to the Starfall Islands with the Holiday Cheer Suit!

The Holiday Cheer Suit can be equipped by accessing the Title Menu and then selecting the EXTRA CONTENT submenu.
legal_notice: ⒸSEGA. All rights reserved. SEGA is registered in the U.S. Patent and Trademark Office. SEGA, the SEGA logo and SONIC FRONTIERS are either registered trademarks or trademarks of SEGA CORPORATION or its affiliates.
name: Sonic Frontiers: Holiday Cheer Suit

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel Core i5-3470 or AMD Ryzen 5 1400
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 660, 2 GB or AMD Radeon HD 7870, 2 GB
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 30 GB available space
  • Additional Notes: 720p Low @ 30 FPS. Requires a CPU which supports the AVX and SSE4 instruction set.
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel Core i5-6600 or AMD Ryzen 5 2600
  • Memory: 12 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 1070, 8 GB or AMD Radeon RX Vega 56, 8 GB
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 30 GB available space
  • Additional Notes: 1080p High @ 60 FPS. Requires a CPU which supports the AVX and SSE4 instruction set.

short_description: Bring some holiday spirit to the Starfall Islands with the Holiday Cheer Suit!
supported_languages:
English*, French*, Italian*, German*, Spanish - Spain*, Portuguese - Brazil, Polish, Russian, Simplified Chinese, Traditional Chinese, Japanese*, Korean
*languages with full audio support
